nodes.text: Tendaar Bel was a Mon Calamari technician who worked under the Galactic Empire before he was freed by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He then was recruited into the RZ-1 A-wing interceptor project, and after scrambling IFF codes at the assault on Cardooine, he was assigned to Alliance Special Operations. He helped capture Whisper Base.
Tendaar Bel appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Takeover at Whisper Base.
